int gcd(int a, int b, int &x, int &y){
    if (a == 0){
        x = 0;
        y = 1;
        return b;
    }
    int x1, y1;
    int d = gcd(a, b % a, x1, y1);
    x = y1 - x1 * (b/a);
    y = x1;
    return d;
}

bool solve(int a, int b, int c, int &x0, int &y0, int &g) {
    g = gcd(abs(a), abs(b), x0, y0);
    if (c % g) {
        return false;
    }
    x0 *= c / g;
    y0 *= c / g;
    if (a < 0) x0 = -x0;
    if (b < 0) y0 = -y0;
    return true;
}
